review: Mostly good so far. Some intital problems with synching it to my TV, but that was because I had lost my Samsung TV remote. I have not tried out the games yet. TV series selection is particularly good. One problem that has been coming up with movies is buffering interruptions but I am hoping that this is a temporary problem. Not sure what the difference is between this and the Fire stick, also.

review: It's very glitchy. It's constantly needing to be reset

review: It's crazy not to have one of these or a Fire Stick if you are a Prime member. Set up was painless. I wanted Prime video on my secondary TV and this has done well for the past month. I would like to have seen a more robust Spotify app. Spotify Connect allows the FireTV to output the audio from my phone. I would prefer not to encumber my phone. This might be a limitation from Spotify though.The Amazon Prime Music app is also not as functional as I would like. Not nearly as nice as the web interface.I haven't really used the other apps or games.  Since this has an optional controller, that's the big advantage this has over the Stick. Given what I like about this, I might also buy a Fire Stick for the bedroom TV though.
author: Amazon Customer
